data.meta_description: I was honoured to be part of these very important, vulnerable conversations yesterday with this inspiring group of people.  Thank you Susan Blain (SusanB) and‚Ä¶
data.text:
Do you have any special events or celebrations coming up in June? This is the last month to support the OCH Foundation through our incredible community partners Beckta dining & wine, Play Food & Wine, and Gezellig dinning. They're generously donating a portion of proceeds from highlighted menu items at their three restaurants directly to the OCH Foundation. Your dining experience can now make a difference! Stephen Beckta

Good morning, Ottawa!!! On behalf of the entire Mindstride Labs Team, we are delighted to support the BGC Ottawa. The club holds a special place in our ‚ù§Ô∏è hearts. Please help support the club so that they can continue to create a safe place for the children of our community. Donate: https://lnkd.in/gRa_gzNM #ottawa #give #bgcottawa Thank you: Adam Joiner, Stephen Beckta, Sylvie Madely, Kathryn Tremblay (She/Her), Jennifer Cross, Michael Wilson, the Board, and all those who support the BGC üôè

Once again, we are proud to make a donation to support an organization that is dear to the heart of our good friend and neighbour Stephen Beckta, who has given incredible long-time service to the BGC Ottawa. Let‚Äôs continue to support the next generation of leaders and change makers in the community.

As workers slowly return to the downtown core, bringing with them an appetite for social gatherings and fine dining, local restaurateur Stephen Beckta of Beckta dining & wine says he‚Äôs ready to satisfy the ‚Äúgrowing hunger.‚Äù Full story here: #OBJ #Ottawa #ottnews #Beckta #ottawadining #restaurant #finedining #winebar #pandemic #elginst #ottawafood #downtownottawa https://lnkd.in/ef53uWwa

Each year it's an honor to partner with the The Snowsuit Fund/Le Fonds Habineige for their 'Dinner Party in a Box' fundraiser with none other than Beckta dining & wine and Stephen Beckta to bring this at-home dining experience for two directly to your doorstep. We've been fortunate enough to help power this dinner for a few years, and I HIGHLY recommend you click the link below and order yours before they sell out. You won't be disappointed! #snowsuitfund #localdelivery #ottawa
